name: PK Sample-App
desc: The app with forms that make you happy!

releases.remarks: Now our app is ready for production.

changelog.desc: Added a batch mode for editing multiple records at once.
Validation failed when whitespace was transmitted via form value.

releases.remarks: This version introduces this release log, updates internal dependencies and adds support for docker.

changelog.desc: Changes will now be tracked and displayed with ProgressKeeper using JSON files and HTML-Bootstrap rendering.
Added server side validation for form fields.
Form field 'gender' is now rendered as radio button instead of select menu.
Modernized server side runtime environment, improving overall stability.

releases.remarks: This release improves some UI styles and fixes a minor bug in the main form.

changelog.desc: Form style is now more compact so that whole form is visible even on small screens.
Form cannot be submitted if name field is left empty but creates no notification.
Added basic tooling and created skeleton.
